channel.title: Will Rep ++ if you help! 317 Delta Devo -- Sleds Not Working Properly[NOTFIXED]
channel.description: How can I get sleds to work properly? Anyone know? When I equip them, I get on them, like usual, like I am going to ride them, then when I walk off I stand up and walk normally and the sled is still there. Can someone please help me.

item.title: Will Rep ++ if you help! 317 Delta Devo -- Sleds Not Working Properly[NOTFIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Danielplanto Danielplanto
item.description:
@Danielplanto wrote:

But its not doing any anim at all is what im saying, to show you what i mean, i made a small video, the code is above, showing that i have the anims, but here is the video explaining the situation even better.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o3gajSOLAcY

Read full topic
item.source: Will Rep ++ if you help! 317 Delta Devo -- Sleds Not Working Properly[NOTFIXED]

item.title: Will Rep ++ if you help! 317 Delta Devo -- Sleds Not Working Properly[NOTFIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Danielplanto, post:5, topic:375164”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=471127.msg3445630#msg3445630 date=1293413359]
I lol’ed,

You have to make it so when you equip it, it sets an emote.

I would tell you how but you learn from trying and doing thing yourself.

Good luck.
[/quote]

Found it: but see, it doesn’t work, what is wrong with it exactly?

public int GetRunAnim(int id) { if(id == 4084) { return 1468; } }

public int GetWalkAnim(int id) { if(id == 4084) { return 1468; } }

public int GetStandAnim(int id) { if(id == 4084) { return 1462; } }
well thats the small piece of it, decided not to add 100000000000000… lines of code. Anyway: The walk/run and stand anims are correct, however still, when I run it won’t slide like it is supposed to? It is odd…

Can someone please help me? Why isn’t it working correctly??[/quote]

Because the run anims and the walk anims are different. So if you put the walk anim in the run anim spot, it is going to do the walk anim, but your character will move faster.

Read full topic
item.source: Will Rep ++ if you help! 317 Delta Devo -- Sleds Not Working Properly[NOTFIXED]

item.dc:creator: @Danielplanto Danielplanto
item.description:
@Danielplanto wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:375164”]I lol’ed,

You have to make it so when you equip it, it sets an emote.

I would tell you how but you learn from trying and doing thing yourself.

Good luck.[/quote]

Found it: but see, it doesn’t work, what is wrong with it exactly?

public int GetRunAnim(int id) { if(id == 4084) { return 1468; } }

public int GetWalkAnim(int id) { if(id == 4084) { return 1468; } }

public int GetStandAnim(int id) { if(id == 4084) { return 1462; } }
well thats the small piece of it, decided not to add 100000000000000… lines of code. Anyway: The walk/run and stand anims are correct, however still, when I run it won’t slide like it is supposed to? It is odd…

Can someone please help me? Why isn’t it working correctly??
